name: Demon Dasher
description:
In the distant future, society replaced its energy with nuclear power. There was one problem: an increase in radioactive waste. A scientist named Cyan attempted to make a creature that can consume nuclear waste. However, it was told that he was killed and the creature fled into the forest. Cyan's partner, Magenta, created a successor to the project named Atom. Atom must journey into the forest and put an end to the radioactive spread.

  • Short bullet hell platformer
  • Switch your aura to absorb the same color
  • Choose your difficulty with Casual / Enthusiast mode
  • 5 stages with a collectible in each one
  • Lots of bullets on your screen

This was a solo project made for the Amaze Me Game Jam.
